quote.msg:
咩叫「be water act」？
可唔可以簡單解釋下，我怕簽錯！

replies.msg:
香港人權與民主法案=制裁負責侵犯香港人權的仆街（只包括中港官員）

Be Water Act=制裁對壓迫香港人民言論、結社、集會、遊行及抗議自由的仆街（包埋外國人）

replies.msg: 其實人權法案係比較針對啲有份參加將香港人送中嘅官員 包括桂民海事件嘅參與者等等 但be water act闊少少 係有份打壓言論同集會自由嘅仆街仔都有機會俾人制裁 例如香港嗰三萬個暴徒 但制裁方法好似一樣 冇加辣到

quote.msg:
咩叫「be water act」？
可唔可以簡單解釋下，我怕簽錯！

香港人權與民主法案=制裁負責侵犯香港人權的仆街（只包括中港官員）

Be Water Act=制裁對壓迫香港人民言論、結社、集會、遊行及抗議自由的仆街（包埋外國人）

replies.msg: 其實相反，Be Water Act只係制裁中港官員同凍結中國國民或中國政府相關機構資產。但人權民主法可以制裁任何外國人/機構。

quote.msg:
咩叫「be water act」？
可唔可以簡單解釋下，我怕簽錯！

香港人權與民主法案=制裁負責侵犯香港人權的仆街（只包括中港官員）

Be Water Act=制裁對壓迫香港人民言論、結社、集會、遊行及抗議自由的仆街（包埋外國人）
其實相反，Be Water Act只係制裁中港官員同凍結中國國民或中國政府相關機構資產。但人權民主法可以制裁任何外國人/機構。

quote.msg:
香港人權與民主法案=制裁負責侵犯香港人權的仆街（只包括中港官員）

Be Water Act=制裁對壓迫香港人民言論、結社、集會、遊行及抗議自由的仆街（包埋外國人）
其實相反，Be Water Act只係制裁中港官員同凍結中國國民或中國政府相關機構資產。但人權民主法可以制裁任何外國人/機構。
你調轉咗喎ching

replies.msg:
Hong Kong Be Water Act
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/senate-bill/2758/text

SEC. 5. GLOBAL MAGNITSKY SANCTIONS WITH RESPECT TO CERTAIN GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS THAT ENGAGE IN SUPPRESSION OF FREEDOMS OF SPEECH, ASSOCIATION, ASSEMBLY, PROCESSION, AND DEMONSTRATION OF THE PEOPLE OF HONG KONG.

(a) In General.—Not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, and as appropriate thereafter, the President shall impose the sanctions described in subsection (c) with respect to each foreign person described in subsection (b) if the President has credible information that the foreign person has knowingly suppressed or facilitated the suppression of the freedoms of speech, association, assembly, procession, or demonstration of the people of Hong Kong, as guaranteed under Article 27 of the Basic Law.

(b) Foreign Persons Described.—A foreign person described in this subsection is a foreign person who is—

(1) a current or former official of the Government of Hong Kong;

(2) a current or former official of the Government of the People’s Republic of China; or

(3) acting on behalf of, or in cooperation with, an official of either such Government.

(c) Sanctions Described.—The sanctions described in this subsection are the sanctions described in section 1263(b) of the Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act (subtitle F of title XII of Public Law 114–328; 22 U.S.C. 2656 note).
...

SEC. 6. FREEZING OF ASSETS OF CHINESE NATIONALS AND STATE-OWNED ENTERPRISES UNDERMINING THE AUTONOMY, BASIC LIBERTIES, AND HUMAN RIGHTS OF THE PEOPLE OF HONG KONG.

(a) In General.—Not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, and as appropriate thereafter, the President shall exercise all powers granted by the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (50 U.S.C. 1701 et seq.) to the extent necessary to block or prohibit all transactions in property and interests in property of each foreign person described in subsection (b) that the President determines has attempted to undermine the autonomy, basic liberties, and human rights of the people of Hong Kong, if such property and interests in property are in the United States, come within the United States, or are or come within the possession or control of a United States person.

(b) Foreign Persons Described.—A foreign person described in this subsection is—

(1) a national of the People's Republic of China;

(2) an entity owned or controlled by the Government of the People's Republic of China; or

(3) an individual who is a member of the board of directors, an executive officer, or a senior official of an entity described in paragraph (2).

...
